text.section:
The operator, superintendent, or mine manager of each mine shall give the commissioner at least ten (10) days' notice of the following:
Abandonment of a mine;
Resumption of work in a mine after an abandonment or discontinuance for a period of two (2) weeks or more; and
Change in the operator or name of a mine.
Each mine shall be inspected and approved by the department before operations are resumed after an abandonment.
